statements: UPDATE asset_depreciation SET current_value = 9000.50, depreciation_rate = 3.5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE asset_depreciation SET current_value = 7500.25, purchase_date = '2022-02-15' WHERE asset_name = 'Laptop';
UPDATE asset_depreciation SET current_value = current_value * (1 - depreciation_rate/100) WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE asset_depreciation SET current_value = 8000, depreciation_rate = 15.5 WHERE purchase_date < '2022-01-01';
UPDATE asset_depreciation SET depreciation_rate = 0.05 WHERE id = 'd1672593-3dfd-4d8c-841c-d41aa2c5d01f';
UPDATE value_changes SET new_value = 1500, change_date = '2023-09-15' WHERE id = 'b4e4e0d7-4379-464d-b80b-6b5a2492148b';

UPDATE value_changes SET new_value = 18000, change_date = '2022-07-15' WHERE asset_id = '98765432-aaaa-bbbb-cccc-111111222222';

UPDATE financial_data SET revenue = 7500, expenses = 3000, profit_loss = revenue - expenses WHERE asset_id = 201;
UPDATE asset_depreciation SET initial_value = 1500.00 WHERE id = 1
UPDATE depreciation_schedule SET depreciation_amount = 100.00, depreciation_date = '2022-02-10' WHERE id = 3
UPDATE asset_depreciation SET current_value = initial_value * 0.8 WHERE purchase_date < '2021-01-01';
UPDATE value_changes SET new_value = new_value * 1.1 WHERE change_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
